desc: Jackscool offers the highest quality pharmacy refrigerators, wine coolers, beer beverage fridges, steak dry ager fridges. Jackscool laboratory refrigerators are the best solution for the storage of the most demanding pharmaceuticals, medicines, vaccines, and for other temperature-sensitive applications.

layout.text:
Committed to finding the most innovative, cutting edge, and just plain cool products, available all around the world,  we put you in the know.
JACKSCOOL, Just Cool, Just Right.
